item.description:
The Rocky Horror Show
Theatre - Performance

Sundays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturdays, September 28, 2006 - October 22, 2006

Worcester Foothills Theatre Company
100 Front Street, Suite 137
Worcester, MA 01608
Google Maps - MapQuest

A cult classic and a wild ride combining a mix of every genre from Sci-fi and comedy, to horror and musical theatre - for an amazing show that you won't soon forget!

Cost: $29.50 - $35.00, $19 student tickets

Sponsored by: WorcesterMagazine, Block 5, American Printing, MassVacation.com, CitySquare, WTAG AM 580

Suggested Audiences: Singles: Elders, Adult, College, High School

Website: http://www.foothillst...
E-mail: jkarlin@foothillstheatre.com
Phone: 508-754-3314


Last Modified: September 29, 2006 at 6:54 AM
